ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex

Class GravisVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.AbstractEditItemObservable
      • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.AbstractGraphItem
        • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex.GravisVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEditItemObservable, IGraphItem, IRestrictedGraphItem, IRestrictedVertex, IVertex

     class GravisVertex
extends AbstractGraphItem
implements IVertex
    This implementation of the IVertex interface gives access to mutable vertex methods.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
